item.description:
April 9, 8pm: Meditation, What's in It for Me?
April 16, 8pm: The Web of the Mind
April 23, 8pm: Karma, Reincarnation, and More.

Dr. Allan Hughes is presenter for this exciting series. [/b
Live link -- Register here for each class.[/url]

For more information about these classes and other Science of Spirituality programs, see the local website
item.why: Taking a class at home, in front of your own computer, is definitely the way to go. Super relaxing.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup
